channel.title: Why can't moderators delete topics?
channel.description: There are so many locked spam topics that mods cant delete and it ruins all the boards.

item.title: Why can't moderators delete topics?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:4, topic:339036”]We can, we just don’t because we often need to explain why the topic is dumb and lock it so the member, or should i say the whole community, knows what is acceptable and what’s not (just like Frell said).

On the other hand, in smf1.1 there was a weird bug with deleting topics so the now defunct moparscape junior moderator group couldn’t delete any topics. Luckily smf2 solves this problem.[/quote]
And because it helps to see how bad the user is so when it comes to needing proof to ban somebody for spam it is considered evidence.

Read full topic

On the other hand, in smf1.1 there was a weird bug with deleting topics so the now defunct moparscape junior moderator group couldn’t delete any topics. Luckily smf2 solves this problem.[/quote]
I didn’t know you couldO_o

item.title: Why can't moderators delete topics?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Also to add I think some admins/mod’s like replying in the topics after they get locked, just for the lulz.

item.title: Why can't moderators delete topics?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

We can, we just don’t because we often need to explain why the topic is dumb and lock it so the member, or should i say the whole community, knows what is acceptable and what’s not (just like Frell said).

On the other hand, in smf1.1 there was a weird bug with deleting topics so the now defunct moparscape junior moderator group couldn’t delete any topics. Luckily smf2 solves this problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Why can't moderators delete topics?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Frell:

Because they pose as an example of what not to do.

Also, I enjoy reading how funny some of them are LOL.
